sub_title: Manager Transport Planning (Global) at Holmen Iggesund
summary:
Graduated with a M.A. in Chinese Studies at Leiden University, Anthony started his career as reporter/editor at the Dutch daily 'The Hague Daily' (Haagsche Courant, now AD Media) but soon shifted his focus to Customer Communication and Customer Relationship Management. Fluent in languages such as Dutch, English, Chinese Mandarin and Chinese Cantonese, he built up a career which stretched from the Benelux to the Greater China region, Scandinavia and the Baltic region. 

From 2012 to 2018, Anthony was the Team Manager of the Customer Service and Credit Control Team of the Benelux, Nordic, Baltics, Russia and CIS region at Holmen's Iggesund Paperboard (HIP). In this role, he was one of the members of the Customer Service Management Team (CSMT) at the European Sales Office of HIP. From 2018-2019, Anthony was the Customer Service Supervisor of the chemical division at the European headquarters of Kraton Cooperation in Almere, the Netherlands. On 1 May 2021, Anthony started in his new role as Manager Transport Planning Global at HIP's supply chain department. 

Anthony considers himself an affable person with strong interpersonal and organizational skills, independent yet a team player.

His biggest hobbies are running, reading, music, gadgetery (sounds better than gadget-nerd), over-analyzing and rewatching every movie he loves and spending quality time with his family.
